item.title: Help with Uberv.3.. files arenot saving
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

okay the problem is your java is not looking inside bin folder you can fix this by moving all the stuff outside from bin folder to main folder but than your compiler won’t work you will have to edit it to

javac *.java
pause

change run.bat to

@echo off java -Xmx800M server 
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Uberv.3.. files arenot saving
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Well it didnt work… but when i open up runserver.bat i get this…

server.ini doesn't exist! Error loading settings java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\server.ini (The system cannot find the file spe cified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.main(server.java:45) Loading npcs... npc.cfg: file not found. drops... npcdrops.cfg: file not found. spawn list...autospawn.cfg~: file not found. done! item.cfg: file not found. drops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. objects.cfg: file not found. Connection from localhost:2127 Dist: character file not found. Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\stackable.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:71) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:661) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:796) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:344) at client.initialize(client.java:5451) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:250) at process.run(process.java:18) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading notedata! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\notes.dat (The system cannot find the path s pecified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:91) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:661) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:796) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:344) at client.initialize(client.java:5451) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:250) at process.run(process.java:18) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading twohanded! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\twohanded.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:107) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:661) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:796) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:344) at client.initialize(client.java:5451) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:250) at process.run(process.java:18) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading tradeable! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\tradeable.dat (The system cannot find the pa th specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:123) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:661) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:796) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:344) at client.initialize(client.java:5451) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:250) at process.run(process.java:18) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while loading sellable! Trace: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\sellable.dat (The system cannot find the pat h specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:139) at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:661) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:796) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:344) at client.initialize(client.java:5451) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:250) at process.run(process.java:18) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Ideas?

item.title: Help with Uberv.3.. files arenot saving
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

my release??

ok ill fix it really fast

goto client.java and find public void logout()

inside it remove 2 lines
if(!validClient)return;
saveNeeded = false;

Read full topic
